title: The Legacy of Gaea Volume I: The Underworld
description: Classic epic fantasy meets exciting anime style action as four teenagers strive to fulfil their destiny and overcome the world-devastating threat of the Dark Clans. In a future where humans have learned to unlock their innate powers, skilled youngsters are sent to elite schools to master their ‘kyu’. A new race, the Titans, has arisen and lives peacefully alongside men, although the threat of the Dark Clans is ever-present. Betrayal hangs heavy in the air as friends become enemies, family turns fraud and teachers become targets. Slowly a web of deceit unfolds revealing a plot that will have a devastating outcome for the whole world – both that of the living and the undead. As if adolescence isn’t hard enough, alongside love, trust, friendship and responsibility, the four friends must master their inner strength and kyu powers if they are to survive the coming battle and fulfil their ultimate destinies.
author: S.L. Gassick
